mqtt: MQTT Trigger¶

Reads messages from MQTT topics.

Attributes¶

Path

Type

Description

subscriptions

subscription (topic, qos)

An MQTT subscription

Example¶

triggers:
  myMqttTrigger:
    kind: "mqtt"
    url: "10.0.0.3:1883"
    attributes:
        subscriptions:
        - topic: house/living-room/temperature
          qos: 0
        - topic: weather/humidity
          qos: 0
